programme.title: Bloody Bites
programme.desc: A compilation of snack-sized horror films to disturb genre fans across the world.

programme.title: Bloody Bites
programme.desc: The ghost of a 10-year-old girl from the 1950's is relocated to a mechanic clubhouse with deadly results.

programme.title: Open Windows
programme.desc: A fan (Elijah Wood) of a sexy actress (Sasha Grey) becomes a pawn (Neil Maskell) in another man's plan to follow her every move.

programme.title: Knightriders
programme.desc: George Romero's unusual story of a modern-day Renaissance troupe whose participants follow a medieval code of honor.

programme.title: The Crazies
programme.desc: A nurse (Lane Carroll) and her husband (W.G. McMillan) try to get out of their infected town, but the Army has it sealed off.

programme.title: Willow Creek
programme.desc: A man (Bryce Johnson) and his girlfriend (Alexie Gilmore) camp in the woods to capture firsthand evidence of Bigfoot.

programme.title: We Are Zombies
programme.desc: Two siblings and their friend must save their grandmother from an evil corporation in a world where zombies coexist with humans.
